title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Stripe: Revolutionizing compliance workflows w/ agentic infrastructure (IND3300)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Stripe：通过智能体基础设施革新合规工作流程 (IND3300)
abstract: Financial services companies struggle to scale Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) processes while maintaining quality as merchant volumes grow. Learn how Stripe revolutionized compliance operations by building Eddie (EDD Detective)—an AI agent built on Amazon Bedrock that automates complex merchant risk assessments, reducing case handling time by 70% and enabling analysts to review 3x more cases. Discover how they built reliability and observability into agent operations, handling thousands of investigations daily while ensuring accuracy of AI-generated insights. Explore architectural patterns for orchestrating multi-step workflows, implementing human-in-the-loop validation, and maintaining audit trails at scale.
abstract_cn: 金融服务公司在商户数量增长的同时，难以扩展增强尽职调查 (EDD) 流程并保持质量。了解 Stripe 如何通过构建 Eddie（EDD Detective）——一个基于 Amazon Bedrock 构建的 AI 代理来革新合规运营，该代理自动化复杂的商户风险评估，将案例处理时间减少 70%，使分析师能够审查 3 倍更多的案例。探索他们如何在代理操作中构建可靠性和可观测性，每日处理数千项调查的同时确保 AI 生成洞察的准确性。探索用于编排多步骤工作流程、实施人工参与验证和大规模维护审计跟踪的架构模式。
